name: currency exchange
short_description: For over 28 years, Continental Currency Exchange has been a leader in personal and business foreign exchange services. Continental features over 160 currencies able to be bought or sold immediately, industry leading service, low cost wires and bank drafts, and some of the longest trading hours in Canada. Continental combines the best exchange rates guaranteed with low-no fees on all transactions, ensuring that no matter where you are in the world Continental will always be your best solution. As a leader in all financial, corporate, and commercial FX solutions, Continental provides best in class service, fully customizable options, and competitive pricing on all products. No matter what your business requires, you need the expertise, innovative solutions, and savings provided by Continental Currency Exchange - Your Foreign Exchange Experts™. An expert in Personal, Financial, Corporate, and Commercial foreign exchange services.
